purpleculture_pinyin:
cóng
cluster; collection; collection of books; thicket
кластер; коллекция; сборник книг; заросли
rtega_mnemonic:
叢叢RS
丛丛		樷欉菆bush, shrub; thicket; collection
  • thick vegetation 丵 so thick you can grab it 取: bush or shrub
  • ⓢ trees 从 standing on the ground 一
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 丛)
Pictophonetic: 半 indicates the sound; 丵 (thick) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
叢書 [ cóng shū ]: a series of books; a collection of books
叢林 [ cóng lín ]: jungle; thicket; forest; Buddhist monastery
叢生 [ cóng shēng ]: growing as a thicket; overgrown; breaking out everywhere (of disease, social disorder etc)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 丵 [ zhuó ] thick (grass)
    • ⿸ Surround from upper left
      • 耳 [ ěr ] ear; to hear, to hear of; handle
      • 又 [ yòu ] and, also, again, in addition
heisig_chinese_memo: I have a huge conglomerate (collection) of old books I'm looking to get rid of. It looks like a thicket covering a wall of my room. They're not in any particular order... some are upside down in a row, some are soiled... just look through them and take whatever you want.
Ru_trainchinese: cóng: (графема/сч.слово) скапливаться, собираться; заросли, чаща; скопление, собрание
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you take (取) the thick grass (丵) from the thicket
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After the typhoons in Shenzhen an assembly line of people pick up the thicket and broken trees off of the floor (streets in this case) which were blown around from the strong winds.
humanum_short_description_en: "Shuowen": "Cong, Juye. Take the sound from Foo." And "Suowen": "Fo, Congshengye." The original meaning of Cong is to grow with vegetation (Tang Kejing today explained). Zhu Junsheng doubts that " cong " means "converging in the province" and "gathering together". The word also for " Cong " or " Cong ", namely " cluster " of or allogeneic or word. Can prepare a word.
humanum_short_description: 《說文》︰「叢，聚也。从丵取聲。」又《說文》︰「丵，叢生艸也。」叢的本義當是草木叢生（湯可敬今釋）。朱駿聲疑「叢」从丵、聚省，會草木聚生之意。字亦作「藂」或「樷」，即「叢」之或體或異體字。可備一說。

叢字的基本解释

叢
cóng
见“丛”。

叢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cóng］
［《廣韻》徂紅切，平東，從。］
亦作“樷1”。“丛1”的繁体字。亦作“菆4”。亦作“藂1”。
(1)聚集。
(2)丛生。
(3)丛生的草木。
(4)泛指聚集在一起的人或物。
(5)众多；繁杂。
(6)犹束缚。
(7)细。参见“叢巧”。
(8)丛葬。
(9)量词。用于聚集或丛生之物。
(10)姓。南唐有丛鐇。见《通志·氏族五》。

叢字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【又字部】　叢； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页167第12
【唐韻】【正韻】徂紅切【集韻】【韻會】徂聰切，?族平聲。【說文】聚也。从丵从取。【書·無逸】是叢于厥身。又姓。南北朝滁州刺史叢鐇。又臺名。在邯鄲。又【集韻】或作樷。【前漢·東方朔傳】樷珍怪。又作藂。【前漢·息夫躬傳】藂棘棧棧。【註】詩葛覃註：灌木曰藂。又【韻補】叶徂黃切，音牀。【韓愈·此日足可惜詩】蕭條千萬里，會合安可逢。淮之水舒舒，楚山直叢叢。逢音房。【韻會】後人誤作菆，或作蕞，二字皆非。毛氏曰：丵，上从四直，兩長兩短。从丱，非。丵原刻下从羊。

叢字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cóng］
["Guangyun" red cut, Pingdong, from. ]
Also known as "Ji 1". The traditional characters of "丛1". Also known as "菆4". Also known as "Cab 1".
(1) Gathering.
(2) Overgrown.
(3) Overgrown vegetation.
(4) Generally refers to people or things gathered together.
(5) Numerous; complicated.
(6) Still bound.
(7) Fine. See "Cong Qiao".
(8) Cong burial.
(9) Quantifiers. Used for gathering or clumping things.
(10) Last name. There is Cong Xi in the Southern Tang Dynasty. See "Tongzhi·Clan Five".
